items.name: Dragon Sphere
items.desc: ^ffcb4aMaterial for manufacturing Dragon Quest materials in the forge in City of a Thousand Streams.

items.name: Mat Token
items.desc: Use this to make Monster dropped materials.

items.name: D. Orb (1 Star)
items.desc: ^ffcb4a100% chance to successfully increase an item's refinement level by 1.Can be used to make higher rank Dragon Orbs at a Jewelcraftsman.^00ffffMaximum refinement level: +1

items.name: The Past of Frostcovered City
items.desc: ^ffd200The memories from the past of Frostcovered City.^ffd200Exchange these with the Martial Arts Master!

items.name: Source of Force
items.desc: ^00ffffRequires 9999 of this item to purchase aHercules pet from Mrs. Zoologist in Archosaur.

items.name: Phoenix Feather
items.desc: ^00ffffRequires 9999 of this item to purchase aBlazing Phoenix from Mrs. Zoologist in Archosaur.

items.name: Small Guardian Charm
items.desc: ^00ffffQuest reward. Unable to be traded or discarded. Protected from death.Unable to be removed if equipped.^ffcb4aEquip a new Guardian Charm to replace an old one.

items.name: Mirage Guardian Charm
items.desc: Crafted by the maker, Beta. May this guard you from all forms of harm forever.

items.name: Small Spirit Charm
items.desc: ^00ffffQuest reward. Unable to be traded or discarded. Protected from death.Unable to be removed if equipped.^ffcb4aEquip a new Spirit Charm to replace an old one.

items.name: Mirage Spirit Charm
items.desc: Crafted by the maker, Beta, cherish it for you will never run out of magical power.

items.name: Yiyuan Stone
items.desc: ^ffcb4aA Chi Stone of Perfect World that has evolved over countless millennia.Yiyuan Stones are the smallest unit of condensed Chi.Used for making Weapon Charms, repairing Shattered Gear, andreplenishing your Aerogear's Acceleration or your Genie's Stamina.
